oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Crozier Family Reunion at Little Leaf Baptist Church, 2006
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Group color photograph of Crozier Family Reunion at Little Leaf Baptist Church in 2006. From the reunion book: "The Crozier Family history begins with a slave named Adaline (Adeline) born around 1844 who had a son named Jack (Jackson) Crozier. There are over 150 descendants of Jack (Jackson) Crozier who are farmers, teachers, lawyers, engineers, doctors, nurses, artists, government workers, homemakers, entrepreneurs, and professional football players.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Little Leaf Baptist Church
Group portraits; African Americans--Tennessee--Oliver Springs; African American families--Tennessee--Oliver Springs
Oliver Springs (Tenn.)
